english.segment1: You see all things. . Into the corners of each heart. . Everything is in Your hands. . From the cradle to the stars
english.segment2: You take our dreams. . And all we hope to be. . Through joy and tears, pain and laughter. . We know you'll never leave. . Oh, You are a love divine. . There's nothing better in this world. . That we could ever find
english.segment3: Oh, Your truth gives life. . You came to set the captives free. . And You've opened up our eyes
english.segment4: We were lost, now we're found. . Changed inside and out. . When Your love came dow
